about_the_game:
Mirage is a 2D action platformer-shooter game that transports you to a surreal desert world. You play as Ono, a cat; and Vio, his fireball-shooting snake friend. Together, they're on the hunt for treasure!

Traverse mystical desert architecture to explore the world of Mirage across three game levels. Each takes place in a different time, with beautiful art direction and hand-drawn animation! Maneuver your way through difficult jumps and treacherous hazards to reach the end of the ruins. Along the way, you'll encounter strange bird-like creatures called Gobs, who guard the treasure with their lives. Watch out—the Gobs will be angry if you take it, and you'll have to make a daring escape!



  • 2D shooting
  • Platforming action
  • Hand-drawn character animation
  • Beautiful art direction
  • An exciting ending escape sequence to every level



This game was developed as a student project at DigiPen Institute of Technology and was created for educational purposes only. Please check out our publisher page for more information.
